channel.title: 1v1
channel.description: How would you make it so that in only a certain area you couldn't team?

item.title: 1v1
item.dc:creator: @Runeblade912 Runeblade912
item.description:
@Runeblade912 wrote:

Add this

[code]public boolean multicombat() {

	if (absX >= **** && absX <= **** && absY >= *** && absY <= ****)
	{
			return true;
		} else {
			return false;
	}

}[/code]

In your 1v1 code

if(plz.attackingPlayerId != playerId && plz.attackingPlayerId != 0 && !multicombat()) { sendMessage("That player is already in combat."); attackingPlayerId = 0; ResetAttack(); break; }

You need to add the 1v1 tutorial for this.

http://www.r00n-server.org/showthread.php?t=47281

Read full topic
